page.title: 03PEOPLE'S CONCERNS (Town)
page.content: There has been a campaign in Wymondham for a swimming pool and Â£29,899 has been raised.The District Council started work on the pool in the High School field but shortly afterwards they stopped and now we don't know how our money is going to be used. Other prime concerns are the inadequacy of street lighting in the outer areas of the town, withdrawal and re-routing of the bus services due to financial constraints, lorries in the narrow roads of the town centre and the narrowness of pavements which is causing problems for mothers, children and old people. There are lobbies for more activities for children; for a B.M.X track and for the town to be tidied up. {CLAIRE & TRACY
